hero.title: Get to Know ECU Tuning Portal
hero.description: Get to know ECU Tuning Portal, a leading software solution for automotive tuning pros. In this section, you can learn about our mission and vision.

content.title: Our Mission and Vision
content.paragraph1: At ECU Tuning Portal, our mission is to provide automotive tuning professionals worldwide with the most advanced, reliable, and user-friendly software solutions.
content.paragraph2: By closely following industry innovations and conducting continuous R&D, we enable our clients to make their businesses more efficient, profitable, and competitive. We aim to be a part of their success by maintaining the highest level of customer satisfaction.
content.paragraph3: Our vision is to be a global leader in ECU tuning technology and to be recognized as a brand that sets industry standards. Beyond being just a software provider, we aspire to be a center of knowledge and innovation for the tuning community.
content.paragraph4: We are committed to shaping the future of automotive performance by combining sustainability with technological advancement. Our greatest desire is to grow with our clients and become their most trusted strategic business partner.
content.paragraph5: Since 2016, we have been shaping the future of the tuning industry with a robust infrastructure and an experienced team serving thousands of customers.
content.paragraph6: Our team consists of passionate professionals specializing in automotive engineering, software development, and customer service.
content.paragraph7: At the core of our success lies our commitment to understanding our customers' needs and providing them with the best solutions.

cta.title: Professional Tuning Solution
cta.description1: ECU Tuning Portal is a fully optimized digital platform designed for professional tuners. It brings together the entire workflow in one panel from file uploads and credit-based transactions to vehicle database search, tuning option selection, and real-time support. Users can track the status of each submitted file step by step, access their transaction history, and generate detailed reports for all operations.
cta.description2: The platform is ideal for international use, with multi-language support, multi-currency payments, flexible credit packages, and secure payment options such as PayPal, Stripe, Iyzico, and Wise. Additionally, built-in tools like Bosch code search and DTC lookup allow users to obtain fast and accurate results. All these features provide a reliable, time-saving, and professional tuning experience.

customerManagement.title: Detailed Customer Management System
customerManagement.description: Create detailed profiles for each customer, track their credit history, add special notes, and manage all file exchanges from one place. Increase loyalty by defining special discounts and campaigns for customer groups.

advancedCredit.title: Flexible and Advanced Credit System
advancedCredit.description: Create various credit packages for different service levels. Integrate automated payment systems that make it easy for your customers to purchase credits and perform detailed analyses with credit usage reports.

fileTracking.title: Comprehensive File Tracking and Management
fileTracking.description: Instantly track the status of each uploaded file (pending, processing, completed). View file history, compare versions, and send automatic notifications to your customers.

advancedInvoice.title: Automatic and Manual Invoicing System
advancedInvoice.description: Automatically generate VAT-inclusive invoices at the end of each transaction or manually issue custom invoices. Simplify your financial management by receiving reports that can be integrated with accounting software.

paymentMethods.title: 6 Different Global Payment Method Integrations
paymentMethods.description: Offer flexibility to your customers by supporting widely used payment methods worldwide, such as Paypal, Stripe, Mollie, Iyzico, and BTC Coin. Secure your financial transactions with a secure payment infrastructure.

languageOptions.title: Global Reach with 16 Different Language Options
languageOptions.description: Expand into international markets by offering your portal in 16 different languages. Maximize user experience by allowing your customers to receive service in their own language and increase their trust in your brand.

notifications.title: Instant Email and SMS Notifications
notifications.description: Get notified instantly via email and SMS when a new file is uploaded, a support request is received, or a transaction is completed. Eliminate communication gaps.

discountSystem.title: Customer Group-Specific Discount System
discountSystem.description: Define special discount rates, price increases, and bonus credits for your loyal customers or dealer groups. Build a flexible pricing structure that supports your marketing strategies.

supportSystem.title: Integrated Support Ticket System
supportSystem.description: Easily receive, prioritize, and manage your customers' technical support requests through the portal. Increase customer satisfaction and problem-solving speed by recording the history of each request.

evcControl.title: EVC Control and Automated Sales System
evcControl.description: Automatically add credits to your dealers or customers and track your sales in real-time through EVC API integration. Synchronize transactions made via EVC with your portal.

automaticDelivery.title: Automated File Delivery System
automaticDelivery.description: Ensure that the modified file is automatically sent to the customer once the tuning process is complete. Save time and increase your service speed by eliminating manual processes.

vehicleDatabase.title: Extensive Database of 17,583 Vehicles
vehicleDatabase.description: Provide detailed and accurate service to your customers based on vehicle make, model, and engine information with our extensive database covering over 17,583 vehicles. This database helps you find the right file quickly.
